author: Business Insider
description:
The world's most expensive colors include a purple pigment made from snail shells and colored pencils that cost 14 times as much as Crayola's. But who's willing to pay sometimes thousands of dollars for these high-quality pigments, and what is behind their price tags? Business Insider visited factories, mines, and secret ateliers to see how different luxury colors are made. 

------------------------------------------------------
